overview: Sizi Sev’s parents are away, so her BFF River Fox comes over to play. Blonde Sophia Grace is joining an all-girl peace corps. Her brunette BFF Kat Monroe isn’t sure how she’s going to last without a cock, so gifts her a big bag of sex toys. Sexy PAWG Candice Dare and fit ebony babe Harmonie Marquise love a good workout at the gym. Petite blonde Scarlett Sage can’t believe her BFF Samantha Hayes has been fucking skater chicks.
title: Best Friends 6
